title: Without Mercy
description: Ayda Hanagan’s life has taken a whole new road to Hell since she agreed to lie down beside Babylon’s very own devil in disguise, Drew Tucker.Lost in the screwed-up perfection of their new fairy tale, Drew and Ayda think they can handle anything life throws at them. But not all their enemies wear patches on their chests, and before they can even see the eyes of the wolves in the shadows waiting to bring them to their knees, they’re all out of places to run. With everything they've ever believed in suddenly at risk, fear is no longer an option, and Drew and Ayda soon find themselves in the middle of a war that looks impossible to get out of alive. In order to survive, they have to learn how to fight together.Without restriction. Without thought. Without mercy. Even if that means sacrificing everything they’ve worked for, including each other.
author: Victoria L. James
